title: march 22: equal treatment at work
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the first state to require equal treatment of women and men in hiring. After, she remembers Vance Joy’s debut EP. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
